#summary Returns user account data for accounts matching search criteria.
#labels Protocol-User

= Request Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* || *Required* ||
||`RequestMethod`||GetUsers||String||Yes||
||`NameQuery`||Search query to match against account names||String||Yes||

{{{
RequestMethod=GetUsers
&NameQuery=John
}}}

= Response Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* ||
||`Success`||True if a Users array was returned, False if a Message was returned||Boolean||
||`Users`||Array of user objects, see below||Array||
||`Message`||Error message||String||

== User Object ==

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* ||
||`UserID`||UUID for the user account||UUID||
||`Name`||Account name||String||
||`Email`||Account e-mail address||String||
|| *`Variable Fields`* ||Free form key value pairs||`*`||

Success:

{{{
{
    "Success":"true",
    "Users":
    [
        {
            "UserID":"efb00dbb-d4ab-46dc-aebc-4ba83288c3c0",
            "Name":"John Doe",
            "Email":"john.doe@email.com",
            "CreationDate":"1261042614",
            "LastLoginDate":"1264728529",
            "HomeLocation":"http://examplegrid.com/scenes/Homeland/128/128/25",
            "LastLocation":"http://examplegrid.com/scenes/BraveNewWorld/53/97/23"
        }
    ]
}
}}}

Failure:

{{{
{
    "Success":"false",
    "Message":"An unknown error occurred"
}
}}}
